mapper.insert:
insert into api_tb_proxy_key
PROXY_ID,
GAME_ID,
PROXY_MD5_KEY,
PROXY_API_URL
#{PROXY_ID},
#{GAME_ID},
#{PROXY_MD5_KEY},
#{PROXY_API_URL}
mapper.select: select * from api_tb_proxy_key a left join api_tb_game b on a.GAME_ID=b.GAME_ID left join api_tb_proxy c on a.PROXY_ID=c.PROXY_ID where a.PROXY_KEY_ID=#{key}
select * from api_tb_proxy_key a left join api_tb_game b on a.GAME_ID=b.GAME_ID left join api_tb_proxy c on a.PROXY_ID=c.PROXY_ID
